help:
/new - Start a vote for a new random map /rate 0-10 - Rate map (Map Ratings) /map - Show mapinfo (Map Info) /soundvolume 0-100 - set soundvolume of the additional sounds (Voice Pack)
Keys ---- F3 - Change team (Racewars) F4 - Toggle bigdar (Traffic sensor) F5 - Show top times (Toptimes) Enter/Exit - Kill player
Admins ------ /config - Configure Race addons /ghostmode - Toggle collisions /checkmap mapname - Find a map /nextmap mapname - Set the next map /random - Change to a random map Change other settings in the Admin panel
